data.what_is:
Mothernode CRM is an all-in-one CRM that combines rich features and efficiency often found in more expensive CRM software. Increase productivity and revenue with timesaving features that focus on customer management, salesforce automation, and marketing automation. Specifically designed for businesses looking to get organized and grow, Mothernode is the only CRM to offer expansion modules like sales orders, purchase orders, invoicing, quotes and more, enabling the software to offer more capabilities as your business needs expand,  delivering a one-stop solution for all your CRM needs. Your sales team, account managers and customer service team will love how easy this software is to adopt and use. The intuitive application delivers all your client's activities and history in one simple interface.

Based in the cloud, Mothernode CRM is accessible from any computer or mobile device, anywhere in the world with an Internet connection. Mothernode CRM supports management and their sales and customer service teams with detailed reporting about the history of client communications and current activity. Analyzing the data from your customer contact history can help guide your marketing team in creating specialized marketing messages for segments of your clientele, resulting in greater collaboration between the various departments of your organization. This increased collaboration results in a more consistent customer experience across all channels, helping to build brand loyalty and increase customer retention.

Mothernode CRM also integrates with a number of popular software applications, including GMail and Outlook. Outlook integration allows you to synchronize your calendars and contacts so you can stay organized and on top of all your important activity. Integration with Quickbooks allows you to monitor spending and revenue from your sales, customer service, and marketing departments and export that data directly into your accounting software.  With all of the time and effort saved through using Mothernode CRM, you can focus more on developing big-picture strategies for growing and developing your business.

Mothernode is a great CRM!  As a current user of MN I can say there are so many benefits to using this great tool. If you want to use one product from start to finish MN(Mothernode) is the product for you.  You can enter leads, quotes, orders, ship from MN, and invoice!  Did I mention they can customize to your product.  For instance the business I am in is custom product so a generic CRM will not do. You ask a question, for help or send over ideas on what you need the MN team is there is help!  Mothernode also offers youtube videos for trainings.

initial_reviews.review_title: Exceptional Customer Service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Mothernode?
We are a specialized manufacturing company, and as such, we need software that can adapt to our needs. Mothernode provides you with marketing, CRM, and ERP solutions which is a huge plus for us, considering that reduces redundancy and outdated data. On top of this, they will always work with you with any problems and actively listen to the growing needs of their clientele and will update their software based on the demand. Another awesome feature that really made us excited to work with them is their integration with Construct Connect/Insight. We are able to seamlessly add new bid jobs in as leads and their information will be updated daily. HUGE timesaver! And they don't upsell you for anything, this is included with the pricing (you do need an Insight account though).

What do you dislike about Mothernode?
I wish there were was a chat feature that could be used between the users that didn't have to be tied to any particular job or contact. I also wouldn't mind having a more sophisticated task assignment feature (they do have this just not as clean or obvious as I would like). I would also like to have a more sophisticated marketing drip campaign feature that will adapt based on clicks or unopens etc. Knowing the team at Mothernode, however, I wouldn't be surprised if they eventually added this.

Recommendations to others considering Mothernode:
If you're working in a niche project-based industry, this is a great software for you. As a small business (really any size), it's imperative to work with a software company that will communicate with you and help you effectively utilize their software. Mothernode is a great asset and I recommend them.

What problems is Mothernode solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mothernode has made lead management easy. Like any organization, having all of your data housed in one place is HUGE, and Mothernode provides us with this solution. From marketing, to lead management, to project management, and even to continual customer service, they provide you with a way to house all of that within their system alone. When you are having issues and reach out to customer support, they are extremely quick to remediate your problem. I have tried Zoho, Salesforce, Shopvox, etc, and NONE of them hold a candle to the customer support we have received from Mothernode.

Everything can be set up to get done without my hands needing to go touch it again and again. Time, time, and time.

all_reviews.review_content:

Using Mothernode is like combining only the best features from the other big software companies into one program and not incorporating the clunky features that do not work. Overall, our employees are more productive with less errors and generally happy to be using a system that fits their needs so well.  To often the value of software is measured in dollars and cents and the employees ease of use is not taken into consideration.

Mothernode is easy to use. We use it to run our entire business. Quotes, Orders, Invoices, Purchase Orders, etc. It keeps things simple. Easy to run reports and find what you are looking for. I really like the flexibility I get working in the cloud so I can work remotely if/when I have to. I also like being able to send invoices to customers through the system and see how many times they've opened them. We can do the same thing with quotes and POs. It makes life easy.

Make sure you get everyone's feedback during evaluation process to make sure they do everything they need to before you go live with the software.

It also helps our satellite offices stay connected to their orders and activities. In the past there were lots of questions on order statuses, etc., but Mothernode gives everyone access to the information they need so there are less questions I have to answer.
